column5: Well I have been very busy chasing bass around this summer and I made a point if fishing lots of different lakes this summer so far I have fished 13 different lakes !!!!! And learned lots of new spots some lakes were new to me some were not and a few are now on my favorites list for sure !!!! Most trips were solo but I do have a few pics of some decent bass !!! It's been a different season for sure and some lakes were hard to figure out but I just stayed at it and worked it !!!!
Good stuff, Shawn! Looks like you're having a good time. Thanks for sharing
13 different lakes...that's pretty good. Diversity is surely a great learning tool. Nice fish!
Very nice. Looks like all of your hard work is paying off!
